title: Urban Escape in the Heart of Manhattan
description: Wake up above Manhattan’s pulsing Madison Avenue and experience the vibrancy of the liveliest city in the world with a luxury stay in the heart of New York City’s Midtown-a stone’s throw from the city’s best attractions. Only a few minutes’ walk from the luxury boutiques of Fifth Avenue, the famous Rockefeller Plaza, the stunning Central Park, Times Square and so much more, you’ll spend three nights in a spacious Deluxe Room with daily American breakfast, discovering all that New York has to offer.
offer_address: 21 E 52nd St, New York, NY 10022, USA

title: Chic New York Escape in the Heart of Manhattan with Welcome Bottle of Wine & Starbucks Gift Card
description:
Set on a serene tree-lined stretch of Park Avenue, this perfectly appointed hotel is the ultimate boutique escape from the usually bustling Midtown area.

Most of the best attractions, including shopping and dining, are within steps of your hotel lobby. Nearby, you can visit the Empire State Building, Grand Central Station, Times Square, the Broadway Theatre District, Bryant Park, Central Park and Rockefeller Center.

Truly experience what it’s like to live in the city that never sleeps by hopping from one Michelin-starred restaurant to the next before lining up for the latest Broadway show and catching the subway home. After running around the city, seeing the sights and feasting on world-class cuisines, return to this sophisticated hotel to unwind.
offer_address: 70 Park Avenue, New York City, New York 10016, USA

vendor_name: Le Meridien New York Central Park
title: Stylish Manhattan City Break near Central Park with Daily US$40 Food & Drink Credit
description:
Experience the magic of Midtown Manhattan at this ultra-swanky hotel on the doorstep of Central Park. From this unbeatable location, iconic landmarks like Times Square, Rockefeller Center, the Museum of Modern Art and Columbus Circle will be your neighbours during your stay.

After days discovering The Big Apple, savour seasonal dishes with American flare at Le Jardin while looking through the floor-to-ceiling windows above Manhattan’s streets. When the sun falls, head up to the rooftop bar for exclusive events and city skyline views plucked from a movie.

Every detail is finely curated to echo New York’s urban sophistication, with leather, marble and timber touches in each room. Consider Le Méridien New York, Central Park your luxe launchpad for exploring The City That Never Sleeps.
location_description: Le Méridien New York, Central Park
offer_address: 120 West 57th Street, New York, New York 10019, United States

title: Legendary New York Luxury Retreat in Times Square with Rooftop Bar & Guaranteed Deluxe Room Upgrade
description:
Timeless sophistication and style meet with the boundless energy of Times Square at this five-star Manhattan treasure, placing you just moments from Broadway and Bryant Park, Radio City Music Hall, the Rockefeller Center and more. Originally constructed in 1906, this landmark building has played host to legendary figures over the years - including The Great Gatsby author F. Scott Fitzgerald, who met his wife Zelda at the hotel.

Each of the 330 guestrooms hidden behind the hotel’s grand 16-story Beaux Arts-style facade exudes a quiet calm. Bespoke furnishings, richly textured fabrics, oak wood finishes, plush bedding, state-of-the-art technologies and Diptyque bath amenities create a tranquil haven away from the high-octane energy of bustling New York below.

Legend has it the Knickerbocker created the first ever 'dry martini' and celebrates this history in its Martini Masterclass series. Guests can expect this and other impeccable offerings, like panoramic views from St. Cloud rooftop bar, a 24-hour fitness centre with a yoga and Pilates zone and the newest steakhouse from the award-winning Charlie Palmer family.
offer_address: 6 Times Square, New York, New York 10036, United States

title: Sophisticated New York City Stay One Block from Broadway with Piano Bar & Hell’s Kitchen Neighborhood Café
description:
Quintessential New York sophistication is what to expect with a stay in this hotel just west of Broadway, nestled in the heart of one of the city's most dynamic neighbourhoods, where culinary delights, Broadway theatres and the sparkling lights of Times Square collide.

Dine at the hotel's signature restaurant, offering an innovative menu inspired by the local food scene, or retreat to your room, styled to encapsulate the essence of New York sophistication. Begin the day with a stroll through SoHo's streets, exploring its high-end boutiques and trendy cafes. Head over to Tribeca for a blend of historic architecture and modern art galleries, and take to the skies at the Empire State Building for breathtaking views from the observation deck.

For a culinary adventure, savour diverse dining options, from upscale restaurants to cozy bistros. In the evening, enjoy a Broadway show in the nearby Theatre District, brimming with life.
offer_address: 851 8th Avenue, New York, New York 10019, United States

title: New York Art Deco Elegance near Wall Street
description:
Discover 1930s grandeur and elegance in the architectural darling of New York City at the glamorous Lyric™ at 70 Pine New York. Elegantly refurbished, this stylish hotel pays homage to its 1932 roots in the Cities Service Building - once the third-tallest building in the world - and is only a short walk from Wall Street, the Statue of Liberty Viewpoint and the Brooklyn Bridge. Enjoy a guaranteed upgrade to a premium Studio Plus Room, US$30 food and drinks credit to use at the onsite City Acres Market deli, guaranteed 2:30pm late checkout, a welcome gift of chocolate, chips, a Lyric™ fabric tote bag and bottled water, plus amenities including daily gym access and Wi-Fi.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: 70 Pine St, New York, NY 10005, United States

title: New York City Five-Star Central Park Retreat with Residence Lounge Access & Waived Destination Fees
description:
Classic mid-century splendour in the heart of Manhattan awaits with a five-star stay at Thompson Central Park New York, a vivid slice of sophisticated Americana boasting unmatched views over the world’s most spectacular stretch of urban green. There's simply no better location - iconic sights Carnegie Hall, the Museum of Modern Art and the Rockefeller Centre are all just a short hop away, and midtown’s legendary fine dining and bar scene promises epicurean adventures beyond compare. After days spent cosying up to the Statue of Liberty or walking Central Park’s elm-lined paths, return to Parker’s for barrel-aged manhattans and live jazz, or seek out the secretive Burger Joint for a taste of one of New York’s most acclaimed sandwiches.

Embrace Thompson Central Park New York’s unique spirit of off-beat luxury as you explore its dazzling range of top-shelf facilities - audiophiles especially will love the unique soundscapes on offer in the hotel's exclusive Victrola vinyl listening room. Each spacious high-floor suite boasts cool colourways, bebop-inspired decor and a dazzling collection of luxe amenities for a truly sophisticated city retreat - the perfect launchpad to the city that never sleeps.
offer_address: 119 West 56th Street, New York, New York 10019, United States

title: Experience Elevated Luxury in Midtown Manhattan
description: Treat yourself to famed luxury above Manhattan's bustling avenues and watch the vibrant streets of the world’s liveliest city with a luxury stay in the heart of New York City’s Midtown-a stone’s throw from the city's best attractions and Time Square. Only a few minutes’ walk from the luxury boutiques of Fifth Avenue, luxe apartment blocks of Park Avenue, stunning Central Park, unique ceiling mural of Grand Central Terminal and so much more; you’ll enjoy a seven or nine-night stay with daily food & beverage credits to share, an audio tour of Grand Central Terminal, a VIP Passport to Macy's New York, discounts on city sightseeing experiences and more as you discover the incredible art, culture and gastronomy that New York has to offer. Plus, buy now and travel until March 2021!
offer_address: 109 East 42nd Street, New York, New York 10017, United States

title: Lower Manhattan Elegance with Daily Breakfast Credit & Nightly Cocktails
description:
New York City dreams come to life with an elegant stay in downtown Manhattan. A modernist masterpiece, Dream Downtown, by Hyatt makes an unforgettable first impression with its striking stainless steel façade punctuated by distinctive porthole windows - a creative nod to the building’s former life as the National Maritime Union headquarters.

Boasting a glamorous Beach Club with a heated glass-bottom pool (open during summer months), a rooftop bar with skyline views and an elegant cocktail bar, embrace the vibrancy of the city that never sleeps. The onsite restaurant Philippe Downtown serves standout Chinese cuisine like crispy Peking duck, Beijing chicken and lobster fried rice.

At the crossroads of New York City’s most iconic neighbourhoods, Chelsea and the Meatpacking District, endless adventure awaits.
offer_address: 355 West 16th Street, New York City, New York 10011, United States

title: Chic New York Escape in the Heart of Manhattan with City Views & Starbucks Gift Card
description:
New York, New York! The land of the free, the inspired and the utterly stylish - stay among it all in true Manhattan fashion at the chic Iberostar 70 Park Avenue. Nestled along the iconic Park Avenue, famous for its prestigious, notable and affluent reputation among New Yorkers, and easily within walking distance to the city’s most notorious landmarks - including Central Park, the Empire State Building and Madison Square Garden - you will not find a more perfectly located hotel. Live out your New York dreams as you join the hustle and bustle of this thriving metropolis, ducking into Starbucks for a Grande Caramel Frappuccino, grabbing a bagel to go and rubbing shoulders with the fashionistas at Saks Fifth Avenue and Bloomingdale’s.

Truly experience what it’s like to live in the city that never sleeps by hopping from one Michelin-starred restaurant to the next before lining up for the latest Broadway show and catching the subway home. After running around the city, seeing the sights and feasting on world-class cuisines, return to this sophisticated hotel to unwind in bed or enjoy a soak in the deep bathtub, or take advantage of your free time to keep up with your fitnes routine at the well-appointed onsite gymnasium.
offer_address: 70 Park Avenue, New York, New York 10016, United States

title: New York Glamour: Manhattan Escape near Empire State Building & Madison Square Garden with City Views
description:
INNSiDE New York NoMad is where bold design meets big-city buzz and NYC culture meets comfort. Sleek interiors meet warm hospitality in this architectural marvel on West 27th Street - expect larger-than-life windows, smart tech touches and laid-back vibes in the heart of Manhattan. Here, every stay becomes a story worth telling.

Fuel up at The Wilson restaurant, or cool off in the Rose Garden Patio, where craft cocktails compete with panoramic views for your attention. Sweat it out in the state-of-the-art fitness centre overlooking downtown Manhattan before unwinding in rooms that redefine urban comfort.

Step outside and find yourself smack bang in the NoMad district. Madison Square Park, the Empire State Building and Fifth Avenue shopping are all just a New York minute away. Surrounded by trendy eateries, hidden speakeasies and cultural landmarks, you're positioned to discover the authentic Big Apple that even locals rave about.
offer_address: 132 West 27th Street, New York 10001, United States

vendor_name: NH Collection New York Madison Avenue
title: Midtown New York Heritage Stay Steps from Empire State Building
description:
The glittering lights and buzzing streets of the city that never sleeps are yours to explore from NH Collection New York Madison Avenue. Boasting an unbeatable location in the heart of Midtown Manhattan, this elegant hotel is the ultimate base from which to discover the world-famous sights of the Big Apple - with the Empire State Building, Grand Central Station and Times Square all within walking distance.

Situated in a 100-year-old heritage building that has been freshly renovated, the hotel is an effortless mix of historic charm and contemporary comfort, with stylish interiors inspired by Madison Avenue’s golden age of advertising. Return after busy days exploring to warm and inviting rooms complete with Nespresso coffee machines, rest your feet with a handcrafted cocktail in hand at the bar, read a book beside the fireplace or unwind with a gourmet tea amid the dark wood of the elegant Suite & Tea.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Prepare for busy days in the city with daily grab’n’go breakfast
- Be welcomed to the city in style with a complimentary drink each on arrival
- Make the most of your stay with late 3pm checkout (subject to availability)

**Want to make your stay extra special?** Upgrade to a room with city skyline views or a spacious Junior Suite.
location_description: NH Collection New York Madison Avenue
offer_address: 22 E 38th Street, New York, New York 10016, United States

title: Contemporary NYC Times Square Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Experience the vibrant pulse of the Big Apple with a stay at this newly renovated hotel, perfectly positioned in the heart of the city's most famous district. This property recently completed a US$20 million renovation, featuring a redesigned lobby, 15th-floor Sky Lobby and three new dining outlets.

From this central location, you're just a short stroll from Broadway's glittering theatres, dazzling lights of Times Square and world-renowned shopping of Fifth Avenue. Venture beyond the hotel to discover Central Park's verdant oasis, the towering Empire State Building and Rockefeller Center, and inspiring exhibits of The Museum of Modern Art (MoMA), all within easy reach.

For a taste of local culture, explore the eclectic eateries and boutiques of nearby Hell's Kitchen. After a day of urban exploration, retreat to the hotel's chic elevated skyline view 42nd And Sky,  where you can sip on expertly crafted cocktails while taking in mesmerising cityscape views.
offer_address: 234 West 42nd Street, New York, New York 10036, United States

title: Boutique New York City Upper West Side Stay near Central Park with Trendy Bar & Daily Breakfast
description:
Live like a New York local with a stay at this charming retreat, located in the heart of the Upper West Side. Just minutes from the iconic Central Park and set in a cosy neighbourhood, Arthouse Hotel New York City is ideal for those looking to wander the city by foot, broaden their knowledge of Manhattan, and feel at home in the city that never sleeps.

When you're not out exploring the city's famous foodie scene, from gourmet food trucks to Michelin-starred restaurants, return to the welcome arms of Arthouse’s own dining spots. Try a tipple at the Prohibition-inspired Arthouse Bar, where local talent frequently take the stage. Taste vibrant Northern Italian and freshly baked pizza at Serafina Upper West and savour inventive Chinese and super-charged dim sum at Redfarm.

Grab a fresh pastry and coffee from the hotel's in-house French-inspired bakery, Patis Bakery, before exploring the Big Apple. A stay here means you'll be within walking distance to a variety of the city's most loved attractions, encompassing everything from Lincoln Square to Harlem Market.
offer_address: 2178 Broadway, New York, New York 10024, United States

Enveloped by the creative culture of Crosby Street, this upscale hotel boasts a prime location in one of New York City’s most thriving, artistic neighbourhoods, renowned for fashionable boutiques, art galleries, high-end restaurants and modern aesthetics.

title: New York Tribeca City Break with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & US$100 Dining Credit
description:
Step into the vibrant energy of New York City at this chic hotel - once a ribbon factory, now a beautifully reimagined urban retreat. The space blends industrial heritage with contemporary sophistication, featuring curated interiors, warm tones and thoughtful design details that nod to its storied past.

Perfectly positioned in the heart of Tribeca, the hotel is surrounded by the neighbourhood's renowned art galleries, boutique shops and celebrated dining spots. It's also just a short walk from the eclectic streets of Soho, the historic charm of the West Village and the dynamic pulse of the Financial District.

Start your day with a freshly brewed coffee from Blue Bottle, savour vibrant Mediterranean flavours at the acclaimed Mostrador, sip handcrafted cocktails with sweeping skyline views at The Flower Shop Rooftop or wind down to live music in the moody, intimate setting of Saint Tuesday. title: Old-World Glamour & Modern Luxury: Stay at New York’s Number-One Hotel
description: Discover the glamorous hotel Condé Nast Traveler crowned Best Hotel in New York City for 2019’s Gold List with a stay at The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel. This fabulous property was one of Manhattan’s first skyscrapers and hosted the New York premiere of Shakespeare’s Hamlet. Your stay includes entry for two to The Beekman’s Alley Cat Amateur Theatre, a chic cellar cocktail lounge that hosts live acts and DJ sets. It also includes breakfast on three mornings of your stay at the hotel's signature restaurant, Temple Court, one cocktail per person at Alley Cat and the resort fee which includes benefits such as the hotel's acclaimed Les Clefs d’Or Concierge Service and a luxury courtesy car.

description:

title: Downtown New York Boutique Luxury with Room Upgrade, Welcome Wine & Daily Breakfast
description:

From this central point, you will be able to explore New York like a true local and get anywhere in the city in under 30 minutes.

Feel the pulse of the world’s liveliest city from this stylish urban retreat. Relax in your generously-sized room, be awed by the collection of Slim Aarons' socialite and celebrity portraits in the hotel's stately lobby, refuel at the sumptuous Tuscan-inspired restaurant and toast to nights in the world's greatest city at the sultry La Soffitta wine bar.
offer_address: 15 Gold St New York NY 10038 United States

title: New York Italian-Style Glamour with Daily Breakfast
description: New York, New York: one of the most exciting cities in the world is on your doorstep at Mr. C Seaport, part of the Leading Hotels of the World collection. This exceptionally stylish boutique hotel is fabulously located Downtown with New York City skyline views, just a short walk from the Statue of Liberty Viewpoint, the Brooklyn Bridge and Wall Street. Enjoy daily breakfast and convenient late checkout at 2pm so you can make the most of your final day in the city.
offer_address: 33 Peck Slip, New York, NY 10038, United States

title: Brand new luxury in the heart of Manhattan
description: Discover the bright lights and famous sights of New York City when you stay at the brand-new Mondrian Park Avenue. Stay five nights and be close to iconic landmarks including Madison Square Park and the Empire State Building, plus receive daily breakfast and a welcome amenity on arrival for two adults.
offer_address: 444 Park Ave S, New York, NY 10016, USA

title: Contemporary New York Escape with Spectacular Manhattan Views
description:
Wake up to sweeping views over New York's iconic skyline with a stay at the ultra-modern Boro Hotel New York, set in the heart of trendy Long Island City, in the lively borough of Queens. Live like a local in one of NYC’s most diverse boroughs, teeming with incredible bars and restaurants, at this industrial-chic hotel. Explore the bustling streets of the city that never sleeps, then retreat to your urban oasis, complete with a striking rooftop bar offering negronis on tap and seasonal cocktails.

A city that’s brimming with cafés, bars that spill out onto the streets, hidden speakeasies, under-the-radar art galleries, and vibrant marketplaces at any given time of the year, the sights of New York City are near never-ending - and you will be perfectly located to make the most of them all. Surrounded by trendy bars and restaurants, and just a short metro ride from New York’s top attractions - world-famous Manhattan is just a 20-minute cab ride away, or a quick 15-minute subway ride (two stops) - Boro Hotel New York is a minimalist retreat offering a collection of beautifully styled rooms with high ceilings, hardwood floors and huge floor-to-ceiling windows with incredible views over the city’s skyline. When you’re not exploring the buzzing dining scene of the Big Apple, the hotel’s restaurant, Beebe's, will satisfy your hunger with authentic NYC pies, pasta and pizza, all accompanied by local beers and handcrafted cocktails.
offer_address: 38-28 27th St, Long Island City, NY 11101, United States

title: Five-Star New York Sophistication Overlooking Times Square
description:
Timeless sophistication and style meet with the boundless energy of Times Square at The Knickerbocker - a five-star Manhattan treasure that places you just moments from Broadway and Bryant Park, Radio City Music Hall, the Rockefeller Center and more. Originally constructed in 1906, this landmark building has played host to legendary figures over the years - including The Great Gatsby author F. Scott Fitzgerald, who met his wife Zelda at the hotel.

Each of the 330 guestrooms hidden behind the hotel’s grand 16-story beaux arts-style façade exudes a quiet calm. There are bespoke furnishings, richly textured fabrics, oak wood finishes, plush bedding, state-of-the-art technologies and Diptyque bath amenities to create a tranquil haven away from the high-octane energy of bustling New York below. Expect impeccable service, a rooftop bar with panoramic city views, a 24-hour fitness centre with a dedicated yoga and pilates zone, and unforgettable culinary experiences, including Charlie Palmer at The Knick
offer_address: 6 Times Square, New York, New York 10036, United States

vendor_name: Intercontinental Hotel New York Times Square
title: Tranquil Midtown Manhattan Stay near Times Square with Onsite Cocktail Bar
description: Experience the pulsating heart of the Big Apple with a stay at the InterContinental New York Times Square, an IHG Hotel. Located in the city's Midtown theatre district, this hotel places you at the epicentre of world-class Broadway shows, gourmet dining and high-end shopping. Savour gastronomic delights and craft cocktails at Stinger Cocktail Bar and Kitchen, or venture out to explore the city's iconic landmarks, including Central Park and the Empire State Building just moments away.
location_description: InterContinental New York Times Square, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 300 West 44th Street, New York, New York 10036, USA

title: New York City Meatpacking District Escape with Rooftop Pool & Bar
description:
Located in NYC’s culture-rich Meatpacking District, the iconic Gansevoort Meatpacking NYC embodies the neighborhood’s industrial history and buzzing energy. With the completion of a top-to-bottom renovation, the hotel boasts brand-new rooms, multi-bedroom suites, and an exclusive Poliform Penthouse duplex. The newly-transformed rooftop bar and restaurant serve up cocktails and light bites alongside breathtaking Manhattan skyline panoramas, guaranteeing an unforgettable culinary adventure. Dine at the ground-floor Omakase sushi restaurant, Saishin, and feast on innovative Japanese cuisine during your stay. Later, ascend to the rooftop, where the year-round heated swimming pool and terrace is the perfect spot to take a dip while admiring the cityscape. Sweat it out at the state-of-the-art fitness centre, where you'll find a MIRROR workout companion, boxing equipment and Peloton bikes.

The fresh produce and local art at the famous Chelsea Market are just a three-minute walk from the hotel, as are the glorious views from The High Line, where you can experience art, design and nature in one breathtaking location. You're never too far from your next great bite or tipple, with more restaurants and bars than you can count within walking distance from the hotel.
offer_address: 18 Ninth Avenue, New York, NY 10014, United States

title: Ultra-Cool New York East Village Escape
description: Bohemian, boutique and utterly unique, The Standard, East Village, draws on New York’s vibrant creative culture to create a cosy urban hideaway backed by astonishing Manhattan views. Feast your eyes on one-of-a-kind murals splashed across the hotel walls, then head to the buzzing Café Standard or retreat to The Garden for light bites and cocktails. For some downtown ambience, pull up a chair at the ultra-cool and inclusive NO BAR before seeking out the district’s must-see sights.
offer_address: 25 Cooper Sq, New York, NY 10003, United States

title: Chic NYC Escape in Iconic Financial District with Pub-Style Restaurant
description: Embrace the excitement of New York's buzzing financial hub with a stay at Hotel Indigo NYC Financial District, an IHG Hotel. This chic retreat places you within a short stroll of Wall Street, vibrant neighbourhoods like Tribeca and Lower Manhattan, and just a ferry ride from the Statue of Liberty. When you're not out sipping cosmopolitans and sampling local delicacies, enjoy delicious New York-style pub food at the hotel's American restaurant, Half Moon.
location_description: Hotel Indigo NYC Financial District, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 50 Trinity Place, New York, New York 10006, United States

title: Sky-High New York City Five-Star Stay on the Edge of Central Park
description: Stay in the greenest corner of New York City's urban jungle at the Mandarin Oriental, New York, a five-star haven on the fringes of Central Park. Perched above Manhattan on floors 35-54, this centrally located hotel wows with spectacular views of the skyline, Hudson River or Central Park, no matter which room is yours to call home. Only steps from the Big Apple's most iconic attractions, including Broadway, Times Square and Fifth Avenue, this hotel also delivers boutique shopping and high-end restaurants to your doorstep. During your stay, stop for sophisticated cocktails and breathtaking Manhattan views at the sky-high MO Lounge, before retreating to the spa for a dip in the 75-foot lap pool, a relaxing treatment or a session in the amethyst crystal steam room.
offer_address: 80 Columbus Circle at 60th Street, New York, New York 10023, USA

vendor_name: Staypineapple, An Artful Hotel, New York
title: Boutique New York Luxury in the Heart of Midtown Manhattan
description:
Discover the bright lights, bustling avenues and famed streets of New York City from the heart of Midtown Manhattan at Staypineapple, an Artful Hotel. This art-inspired abode is located moments from iconic landmarks including Central Park, the Empire State Building and Times Square. In a city that’s brimming with cafés, bars that spill out onto the streets, hidden speakeasies, under-the-radar art galleries and vibrant marketplaces at any given time of year, the sights of New York are near never-ending. Hop on one of Staypineapple's complimentary beach cruisers and explore on two wheels, or take a three-minute stroll to the subway and travel through New York like a local.

Fall in love with the hotel's unique approach to art and design, from the beautifully abstract pieces and tiling to Staypineapple’s signature yellow pineapple that adorns the rooms and lobby. Offering an effortless combination of Midtown Manhattan sophistication, gracious service, a spectacular location and pet-friendly accommodation, Staypineapple, an Artful Hotel ensures an effortless New York experience.
location_description: Staypineapple, An Artful Hotel, Midtown New York
offer_address: 337 W 36th St, New York, NY 10018, United States

description: Where modern luxury and old world glamour converge, experience the beauty of the Big Apple with a stay at the prestigious InterContinental New York Barclay, an IHG Hotel. Located in the beating heart of Midtown Manhattan, this historic hotel, originally opened in 1926, is just steps from Park Avenue, Times Square, Central Park and the luxury boutiques of Fifth Avenue. Between city adventures, retreat to the 1920-style Parlour for a classic cocktail, or to dine on delectable cuisine.
location_description: InterContinental New York Barclay, an IHG Hotel

Perfectly positioned in the city's most artistic district, this luxe, urban-chic retreat is your gateway to the galleries, boutiques and eateries of the Lower East Side. Rustic Italian cuisine is on the menu at Bellini, while the grand Bellini Bar is all gilded edges and velvet upholstery: the perfect spot to sip on an expertly crafted Italian cocktail (don't miss a chance to try a Bellini, invented by the legendary Mr Cipriani himself).

description: Journey to New York City's bohemian heart with a stay at Walker Hotel Greenwich Village. Savour the flavours of the city at the hotel's Society Cafe, a market-to-table eatery sourcing ingredients from the nearby Union Square Greenmarket, or venture out to explore the vibrant jazz and arts scene of this culturally rich neighbourhood.

description: Discover the heights of luxury in one of New York’s most legendary locations with an exclusive stay at 5th & 55th Residence Club, positioned within beloved heritage icon The St. Regis New York. Just moments away from Central Park, each residence blends Manhattan’s unique magic with peerless sophistication, backed by round-the-clock butler service and impeccable facilities. After days spent exploring the city that never sleeps, enjoy elevated American meals beneath the frescoed ceilings and sparkling chandeliers of Astor Court, or head to the renowned King Cole Bar - birthplace of the Bloody Mary - for signature sips while marveling at its renowned Maxfield Parrish mural.

title: World-Class New York Heritage Stay Overlooking Central Park with Two Onsite Restaurants
description:
Synonymous with timeless elegance and award-winning luxury, this lavish hotel is one of the most prestigious in the world. For more than a century, this world-class retreat has defined style with its grand marble lobby, iced crystal chandeliers and gleaming gilded accents.  

Dining here is a royal affair, with the palatial Palm Court serving afternoon tea and delicate bites, while the refined Champagne Bar beckons guests to come and sample the world's finest wines, champagne and caviar. Enjoy a rejeventing treatment at the Gerlain Spa or visit one of the many opulent stores that call this hotel home.

title: Five-Star West Manhattan Stay with Five Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Indulge in Manhattan’s glittering elegance with a sophisticated stay at the Pendry Manhattan West. Settle into sumptuous velvet-lined booths at Zou Zou's, bask in the intimate grandeur of Bar Pendry, or take in the glamour of three other elevated bars and eateries. title: Boutique Escape in New York's Ultra-Cool NoMad District
description:
Treat yourself to an exciting escape above Manhattan's bustling avenues at The James New York - NoMad, an ultra-cool boutique hotel concealed in the wrapper of a beautiful Beaux-Arts structure in the heart of Midtown Manhattan.

Centrally located among the trendy bars, lounges and restaurants of the eclectic NoMad neighbourhood (also known as Madison Square North), The James New York - NoMad sits minutes from New York’s best attractions. Feel the pulse of the world’s liveliest city as you discover Times Square, the boutiques of Fifth Avenue, the luxe apartment blocks of Park Avenue, stunning Central Park and so much more. Then return to this boutique hotel, where a world of cosy lounges, an upscale restaurant, midcentury-inspired cocktail lounge and state-of-the-art gym await.
offer_address: 22 E 29th St, New York, NY 10016, United States

title: Ultra-Chic Five-Star New York City Escape with Manhattan Views, Rooftop Terrace & Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description: Experience the height of luxury in the heart of SoHo at The Dominick Hotel, a designer New York City escape offering unrivalled views of the Manhattan skyline. Discover the city's vibrant art scene, chic boutiques and world-class dining, found within a 26-block radius. After a day of exploration, retreat to the Michelin-starred Vestry for a culinary journey, or unwind with a cocktail at Mezzanine. Forget you’re in the centre of it all with an indulgent treatment at Sisley Spa NYC, or watch the world go by from sky high at Terrace on 7.
offer_address: 246 Spring Street, New York, NY 10013, United States

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan Ny
title: Central New York City Escape Overlooking Times Square
description: Experience the Big Apple in all its glory with a stay at Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned in the heart of the Broadway district. Spend your days exploring the abundance of iconic landmarks nearby including Central Park, the Empire State Building, the Statue of Liberty and Fifth Avenue. location_description: Crown Plaza Times Square Manhattan, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1605 Broadway, New York, New York 10019, United States

title: Artsy New York Escape in the Heart of Vibrant SoHo
description:
Discover one of Manhattan’s most stylish neighbourhoods with a stay in the heart of New York at NoMo SoHo. Tucked away in one of SoHo's renowned cobblestone streets, this stylish property is an artsy urban retreat near the area's very best cultural experiences. With a name that stands for 'nostalgic and modern', the hotel perfectly encapsulates SoHo’s essence in its modern rooms and quirky spaces. The vine-covered entrance will draw you down a rabbit hole of contemporary art installations, bright colours and vintage furniture, while the rooftop boasts some of the best views over Manhattan’s glittering skyline. The jewel in the hotel’s crown? NoMo Kitchen, the hotel’s ultra-cool restaurant, beautifully decorated with sparkling chandeliers and art installations, and a firm celebrity favourite.

Outside the hotel, the bustling streets of New York await. You'll be perfectly placed to explore the city's neighbourhoods, from Midtown to the Upper East Side, and surrounded by some of the best restaurants - Balthazar, Blue Ribbon Brasserie and Shuka to name a few - not to mention a myriad of galleries, independent shops, boutiques and SoHo’s elegant cast-iron architecture.
offer_address: 9 Crosby St, New York, NY 10013 New York NY 10013 United States

title: Iconic Midtown Manhattan Sofitel Grandeur near Times Square and Fifth Avenue with Art-Deco Restaurant
description:
Stay in the beating heart of New York's concrete jungle at this serene French-inspired escape, located a stone's throw from Times Square. Immerse yourself in the best of the iconic city, with the Empire State Building, Bryant Park and Broadway all within a 10-minute walk, and a plethora of restaurants and bars right outside your door.

When you don't feel like venturing far for your next meal, the hotel's French-inspired Gaby Brasserie is your go-to for French delicacies, while streetside people-watching and handcrafted cocktails are on the menu at Mademoiselle Gaby. If walking the streets of NYC isn't enough to get the heart racing, the onsite fitness centre's modern facilities will do the trick.
offer_address: 45 West 44th Street, New York City, New York 10036, United States

title: Langham Midtown Manhattan Luxury near Iconic Empire State Building
description: Experience the elegance of the Big Apple at The Langham New York, a five-star sanctuary of city luxury, nestled in the heart of Manhattan. Luxuriate in the lavishly designed rooms offering breathtaking skyline views, sample the cuisine at Ai Fiori or sip on epic cocktails at the Bar Fiori. Perfectly positioned near the iconic Empire State Building, discover culinary delights, high-end boutiques at Fifth Avenue and see the dazzling lights of Times Square, just moments away.
offer_address: 400 Fifth Avenue, New York, New York 10018, USA

title: New York SoHo-Inspired Sophistication Steps from Canal Street with High-End Restaurant & Garden Terrace
description:
At the intersection between stunning heritage architecture and cutting-edge trends, this vibrant SoHo stay perfectly encapsultes the energy of New York. Centrally positioned in this thriving neighbourhood renowned for its fashionable boutiques, art galleries, and trendy eateries, enjoy cocktails in the Rose Garden or seasonal New American fare at Nomo Kitchen between pavement adventures.

Start each day with an energising coffee and light bite at the Cafe before heading out for the day, taking a leisurely stroll to nearby Chinatown for authentic dim sum or Little Italy for a taste of the Mediterranean. Just a short drive away, explore some of the city's most iconic sites.
offer_address: 9 Crosby Street, New York 10013, USA

title: New York Boutique Glamour in the Meatpacking District
description: There’s nothing standard about an escape to New York’s The Standard, High Line - this unforgettable hotel sits at the apex of cool, high above the eponymous public park. Each room dazzles with floor-to-ceiling windows gazing across the shimmering cityscape and the mighty Hudson River. A slew of superb onsite restaurants and bars - including modern brasserie The Standard Grill, rooftop discothèque Le Bain and the open-air The Standard Biergarten - stand electric at the centre of the Meatpacking District’s roaring nightlife scene. A revelation unlike anywhere else in New York, The Standard, High Line routinely hosts a whirlwind schedule of the city's coolest events and sits only a short walk from the restaurants, bars and boutique shopping streets of West Village and Chelsea.
offer_address: 848 Washington Street, New York, New York 10014, United States

title: Stylish Manhattan Hilton Escape Opposite Museum of Modern Art with Onsite Bar, Restaurant & Lounge

Steps from the Museum of Modern Art, this stylish city stay is a short walk from the city's most exciting attractions from Central Park, Times Square and the glittering shops of Fifth Avenue. description: Embrace New York elegance with a luxurious stay at one of the city's landmark hotels steeped in a century of history. The hotel's enviable location places you steps away from the renowned Fifth Avenue shopping district, the dazzling lights of Broadway, and the verdant tranquillity of Central Park. description: Experience the pulsating energy of New York City with a stay at Walker Hotel Tribeca, a former ribbon factory given a new lease on life as a luxury hotel. An eclectic mix of restaurants and bars look after your drinking and dining needs at every time of day - satisfy your palate at Mediterreanean restaurant, Mostrador; sip cocktails at The Flower Shop Rooftop, listen to live music at Saint Tuesday, or jump-start your morning with a coffee at Blue Bottle. Situated within walking distance of Little Italy, Chinatown and SoHo, you'll be living like a local in no time.

description:
Join the New York elite with a luxurious stay at one of Manhattan's most striking abodes - Mondrian Park Avenue, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Fusing the eclectic style of the NoMad neighbourhood with a contemporary twist, this fashionably bold hotel makes a statement across the New York skyline - the perfect choice for those seeking a central oasis amid the bright lights of the big city.

Perfectly positioned only moments from the iconic Empire State and Flatiron buildings, the hotel's enviable location at the core of midtown Manhattan makes it easy to take a bite out of the Big Apple. Witness sweeping skyline vistas from the rooftop lounge or simply relax in one of the beautifully designed guest rooms complete with custom plush king bed and bespoke furnishings, and enjoy a restful night in the city that never sleeps.

title: World-Class The Plaza New York Heritage Stay Overlooking Central Park
description: The Plaza in New York City, synonymous with timeless elegance and award-winning luxury, is one of the most prestigious and iconic hotels in the world and ranked in the top ten best hotels in New York City by Travel + Leisure's 2022 World's Best Awards. Dining is a royal affair, with the palatial Palm Court serving afternoon tea and delicate bites while the refined Champagne Bar beckons guests to come and sample the world's finest wines, champagne and caviar while overlooking the famous Pulitzer Fountain. For more than a century, this world-class chateau has defined elegance, from its historic Beaux-Arts façade to the grand marble lobby, iced crystal chandeliers and gleaming gilded accents. A stay here places you in a stellar Manhattan location along the southern edge of Central Park, on Fifth Avenue and on the brink of the Upper East Side.

title: New York Sky-High SoHo Retreat with Rooftop Pool
description:
Embrace the vibrant city buzz of New York with an ultra-stylish stay at ModernHaus SoHo, where the guest experience radiates the same edgy, cool vibes of the surrounding neighbourhood. With a stellar location for exploring Downtown, the ModernHaus SoHo places you right where you need to be: within striking distance of the city’s best dining, high-end shopping and cultural icons.

Inside this sleek retreat, you will find a museum-worthy collection of artworks from local and international talent, distributed throughout shared spaces and guest rooms. Enjoy a range of onsite restaurants and bars, including elegant dining at Veranda, all-day eatery Jumpin Jacks and rooftop bar Jimmy. Arguably one of the biggest drawcards of this metropolitan crash pad is the sprawling outdoor space, covering 11,000 square feet and offering an immediate reprieve from the busy streets that frame the hotel. There’s also an Instagram-worthy rooftop pool (seasonal), so you can swim at skyscraper level while soaking up views of the Hudson, a 17th-floor fitness centre with a Peloton bike and TechnoGym equipment, and a 24/7 concierge service to cater to your every whim.
offer_address: 27 Grand St, New York, NY 10013, United States

title: Brand-New Hard Rock New York City Stay near Times Square with Rooftop Bar
description: Rock out at the brand-new Hard Rock Hotel New York, the hottest new property to take the spotlight in Midtown Manhattan. Sandwiched between the Theatre District and Radio City Music Hall, this vibrant hotel places you within close proximity of some of the world's hottest theatre performances, local live music gigs and iconic city sights. In true Hard Rock style, the hotel is a treasure trove of rare music memorabilia and original artwork that pays homage to New York City's underground music industry. Listen to incredible beats while drinking in cocktails and incredible views of Times Square at RT60 Rooftop Bar and Lounge, opt for upscale dining at NYY Steak, or savour farm-fresh seasonal cuisine in a music-inspired setting at Sessions. Other incredible facilities include Body Rock® fitness, two entertainment venues and an onsite Rock Shop® boutique.
offer_address: 159 West 48th Street New York City, New York 10036 United States
